gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 115, Kings 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat snapped a seven-game losing streak as they defeated the Kings, 115-106. Jimmy Butler led the Heat with 31 points (10-14 FG), seven rebounds, and six assists as Josh Richardson (season-high 24 points and six 3PT) and Bam Adebayo (16 points, 11 rebounds, four assists) added 40 points. Keegan Murray led the Kings with 33 points (12-18 FG, 7-11 3PT) as Domantas Sabonis added his thirteenth triple-double of the year with 19 points, 17 rebounds, and 13 assists. The Heat improve to 25-23 as the Kings four-game win streak is snapped, with them moving to 27-19.
